@param _addressesProvider the address of the GlobalAddressesProvider

calculateLoanOriginationFee

calculateLoanOriginationFee(address,uint.details: calculates the origination fee for every loan executed on the platform.

params._user: can be used in the future to apply discount to the origination fee based on the _user account (eg. stake AAVE tokens in the lending pool, or deposit > 1M USD etc..)

initialize(address).details: initializes the FeeProvider after it's added to the proxy

userdoc.notice: Implements calculation for the fees applied by the protocol
